title: Shadow Ruler
description: End the game by achieving 100 Influence and at least 60 of People.

title: Civilian Hero
description: Achieve a state of 90 money by the end of 6th round.

title: Civilian Hero
description: Achieve a state of 90 people by the end of 6th round.

title: The Great Collapse
description: Make all three opponents drop below 20 Influence.

title: The Great Collapse
description: Make all three opponents drop below 20 Money.

title: Double Agent
description: Win the game if the player on your right falls below 20 people.

title: Double Agent
description: Win the game if the player on your left falls below 20 money.

title: Money Mogul
description: Finish with more than 80 Money while Influence is above 40%.

title: Money Mogul
description: Finish with more than 80 People while Influence is above 40.
